title: It’s Kasumin’s Proud Swimsuit!
detail_text: <:th_ch0202/>You-senpai, what do you think of Kasumin’s swimsuit? Is it cute?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>It’s really cute-! It fits you, Kasumi-chan!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>Kyaah-! Kasumin knows that it does, Kasumin knew that it does, but it really does, huh~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>Then, let’s get swimming right away<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>Wait, wait! You can take more time to enjoy this cute swimsuit Kasumin, you know!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>Is that so? Then, I’ll enjoy it…. *stare*.... Alright, let’s get swimming!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>So fast!? But, but, if Kasumin swims then Kasumin’s hair will get flat and Kasumin will not be cute anymore….<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>You think so? Your tidy hair is good, but I think you’re cuter when you’re enjoying yourself swimming, Kasumi-chan<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>Eh!! Really!? Geez, you really love Kasumin, huh, You-senpai! Then, let’s swim~♪<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>Yaay-! Let’s swim, let’s swim-!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
